title: "Future Metropolis"
content:
# Future Metropolis

Welcome to Future Metropolis, a website dedicated to exploring the latest advancements in science fiction and technology. Our site features articles, reviews, and news about the latest trends in futuristic design, from flying cars to smart cities.

Our team of writers and contributors are passionate about all things sci-fi and tech, and we strive to provide our readers with engaging and informative content that inspires them to imagine what the future could hold.

Whether you're a fan of classic sci-fi films like Blade Runner or excited about the latest developments in artificial intelligence, you'll find something to enjoy on Future Metropolis. So come explore the future with us!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A futuristic image of a cityscape with flying cars for a sci-fi or technology website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
